title: Kim Jong Un: The Unauthorized Biography

sources.title: Beyoncé: Baby and Beyond (Unauthorized Biography)
sources.description:
Platinum-selling singer, A-list actress, Beyoncé Knowles is a superstar with no limits. From Destiny’s Child to her relationship with Jay-Z - and birth of their baby Blue Ivy - she’s become an ever-evolving woman who can seemingly do no wrong. Featuring exclusive interviews with her family and inner circle of friends.

Directed by: Iain Kennedy
2013

metadata.Plot: He is the living God of the 9th nuclear power of the world, raised in secrecy to take over the commands of the North Korean regime. Investigators travel to Switzerland, the USA and Asia to find those who really know Kim and try to profile the new leader.
metadata.Actors: Jong-Un Kim, Titus Plattner, Ueli Studer
